html:
Sustainable Tourism Destinations

The aim of this module is to provide students with a thorough understanding of sustainable tourism in a destination context. Students will understand what is meant by sustainability, the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), and how tourism can contribute to these at the destination. Students will understand the range of impacts tourism can have in a variety of destination settings, and be aware of how these can be managed to develop sustainable tourism destinations in the future.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Have developed an understanding of sustainability and, in a destination context, be aware of how tourism can contribute to meeting the Sustainable Development Goals

+  Have developed knowledge and understanding of tourism destinations and global tourism flows

+  Be able to demonstrate knowledge and understanding of the impacts of tourism at a variety of destination types

+  Have developed un understanding of how destinations can manage tourism to become more sustainable.

Module Content:
